data.text:
Relive the most memorable moments from FFVII and experience the journey of a young hero Sephiroth.

Experience both classic and new stories within the FFVII universe presented in a retro-style look combined with modern, beautifully rendered graphics, thatâs easily accessible on the go. Team up your favorite characters and customize each one with iconic gear and weapons to defeat powerful opponents in Solo or Co-op battle mode.

â EXPERIENCE NEW AND ORIGINAL STORIES FROM THE FINAL FANTASY VII UNIVERSE

Discover the never-before told story of a young hero, Sephiroth.

Encounter new characters along the way and play as iconic heroes, such as Cloud and Zack, in the epic storylines of the original FINAL FANTASY VII and CRISIS CORE -FINAL FANTASY VII- in episodic installments.

FINAL FANTASY VII: The story of Cloud Strife, an elite SOLDIER operative turned mercenary. Cloud lends his aid to an anti-Shinra organization: Avalanche, unaware of the epic consequences that await him. Once more begins a story that will shape the destiny of the entire world.

CRISIS CORE -FINAL FANTASY VII- : The story of Zack Fair, a promising young operative in the Shinra militaryâs elite unit, SOLDIER. The story takes place seven years before the events of FFVII. Follow the tale of Zackâs dreams and honor â and the legacy that connects him to Cloud.

The action unfolds through the characters in a modern-stylized polygon look, inspired by the original FFVII.

Even those experiencing FFVII for the first time can enjoy this expansive world in this epic saga that defined RPGs for gamers throughout the world!

â EVOLVED GAME SYSTEM OPTIMIZED FOR MOBILE WITH HIGH-QUALITY GRAPHICS

Immerse yourself in beautifully rendered, fast-paced command-based battle evolved from FFVIIâs Active Time Battle -- now revamped to play smoothly on mobile devices with high-quality graphics. The battles give spotlight to classic FINAL FANTASY RPG elements such as, Abilities, Materia, Summons, and heart-pumping Limit Breaks, while supporting additional features on mobile such as Auto Mode and Battle Speed that make the game even more enjoyable to play.

â BUILD AND CUSTOMIZE THE ULTIMATE PARTY

Form a party of your favorite characters from FFVII series titles, such as Cloud, Tifa, Aerith, Zack and more! Dress them with new gear unique to FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS.

â WORK TOGETHER WITH FRIENDS in CO-OP BATTLE

Lead your group of friends from around the world with up-to 3 member Co-op battle to defeat powerful bosses together!

Good and F2P

Iâve played this game since day 1 and despite being able to auto almost everything except high power content, it has been very enjoyable and very F2P. The game is all pve and you arenât competing with other players. You donât have to summon on most banners because old gear are all still very viable. The banner rates have been pretty fair for me so far. The Chocobo stamp board is the pity system and itâs better than other gacha games Iâve played because you can get the banner weapon and costume guaranteed and can hit pity faster with the chance of getting more than 1 stamp from summoning.

I only have 2 big complaints with this game. The first one is that the stamina cap should be a lot higher and have a faster recharge time. Youâll burn through stamina very quickly because of the x9 stamina usage, meaning youâll only be able to do 1-2 runs and if you donât have stamina boosters or donât wanna spend crystals for stamina then thatâs it your pretty much done playing. The second thing is that currently costumes are gone forever when their banner is gone. Thereâs a lot of old costumes that I wished I had but I can no longer get and newer players can never get them. Just slowly add a few older costumes at a time into the costume exchange shop, all the costumes currently in that shop are bad and it will make buying the costume exchange tickets actually worth getting.
